{"id":1145914951,"question_id":3245,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1705230017,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"963 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1145914951/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Beautiful Indices in the Given Array I","memory":"46.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<Integer> beautifulIndices(String s, String a, String b, int k) {\n        List<Integer> alist = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Integer> blist = new ArrayList<>();\n        // int b_min = Integer.MAX_VALUE, b_max = Integer.MIN_VALUE;\n        int index = 0;\n        while(index != -1){\n            index = s.indexOf(a, index);\n            if (index != -1) {\n                alist.add(index);\n                index++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        index = 0;\n        \n        while(index != -1){\n            index = s.indexOf(b, index);\n            if (index != -1) {\n                blist.add(index);\n                index++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if(alist.size()==0 || blist.size()==0){\n            return new ArrayList<Integer>();\n        }\n        \n        \n//         List<Integer> res = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n//         for(int i=0, j=0;i<alist.size();i++){\n//             if(Math.abs(alist.get(i) - blist.get(j))<=k){\n//                 res.add(alist.get(i));\n//             }else if()\n//         }\n        \n        List<Integer> res = alist.stream()\n                .filter(i -> blist.stream().anyMatch(j -> Math.abs(j - i) <= k))\n                .collect(Collectors.toList());\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-beautiful-indices-in-the-given-array-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
